text: aur usase badhakar zaalim kaun hoga jo khuda kee masajidon mein usaka naam lie jaane se (logon ko) roke aur unakee barabaadee ke dar pe ho, aison hee ko usamen jaana munaasib nahin magar sahame hue aise hee logon ke lie duniya mein roosavaee hai aur aise hee logon ke lie aakherat mein bada bhaaree azaab hai
